content:
I have two concurrent PR giving, for a group action, the mul-equivalences between stabilizers associated with group elements, and their properties.

  • #24107 is the one I need for later work, it defines stabilizer G a ≃* stabilizer G b associated with an equality b = g • a.

  • #24039 defines stabilizer G a ≃* stabilizer G (g • a).

One may discuss, moreover, the natural direction of these equivalences.

The interest of the first version is that the transitivity formula naturally fits in docs#CompTriple.
It is used in #23962.
